name: Time Activity: Paranautical Slicer
description:
PLEASE PLAY THE WEB VERSION IF YOU CAN!

Use RMB to do slick tricks!

Paranautical Chop Chop Game

Time Activity Paranautical Slicer is a fast paced FPS. The game is inspired by titles like: Paranautical Activity, ULTRAKILL and of course one of out previous titles, Time Slicer. You have to beat 3 arenas, killing waves of enemies, with several weapons to unlock by playing.

Have Fun!

Instructions

So, unfortunately, the version we submitted contains some bugs. Here is how to solve the issues caused by 'em.
1. First of all, at the start you get NULL weapon. Just get the sword for free from the shop and remove it from your loudout.

2. You will need a gun for arena 2, otherwise it is impossible. make sure to buy it.

  • MOVEMENT - WASD/ARROWS
  • LOOK - MOUSE
  • SWITCH WEAPONS - SCROLL
  • LMB - SHOOT
  • RMB - COOL TRICK STUFF
  • SPACE - HOP AROUND
  • E - INTERACT

Use the billboards to start new waves, buy weapons and change your loadout. After you buy a weapon, you have to add it to you loadout to be able to use it.
